wikipedia_page.main: Ernest Bacon (5 June 1893 – 18 April 1966) was a British wrestler. He competed in the freestyle lightweight event at the 1924 Summer Olympics. Bacon was a Civil Servant.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 1924 Summer Olympics

response: He was born in Camberwell. He was the brother of Ernest Bacon and Stanley Bacon.
* Ernest Bacon, British wrestler, competed in the 1924 Summer Olympics (b. 1893)
